updates.title: Figma opens new office in Bengaluru and expands beyond design tools to appeal to more developers as part of its India expansion strategy.
Anthropic announces massive $50 billion data center infrastructure investment in the US through partnership with UK-based Fluidstack to build AI computing facilities.
Fei-Fei Li's World Labs launches Marble, its first commercial product that creates persistent, downloadable 3D environments rather than generating worlds on-the-fly like competitors.
Meta's chief AI scientist Yann LeCun reportedly plans to leave the company to build his own startup focused on world models, marking a significant departure from the tech giant.
AI data startup WisdomAI raises $50M Series B led by Kleiner Perkins and Nvidia, offering AI-driven analytics that can process structured, unstructured, and 'dirty' data for business insights.
